title: In South Carolina, Class Action Lawsuit Pits Foster Kids Against State
teaser: After years of high profile problems — including the death of five children and cries of inaction — the South Carolina Department of Social Services is facing a new hurdle. Foster care children in the state have banded together in a class action lawsuit to demand changes.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
